People of London and St Albans - we'll be hosting a big snazzy comedy night at @CrownStA in a few weeks. With a bunch of delightful hand-picked comedians, and even a bigwig off the telly! It will be friendly, intimate and fun. And I get to host. Where's your ticket? https://t.co/ejy5U34X9N
